title: proposal: tap format for tests
body:
I was working/wondering on this issue: https://github.com/stretchr/testify/issues/279

But I think belongs here more than us. 

I'll propose to add a `-tap` flag  in the `testing#decorate` function so we can use [different reporters](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome-tap#reporters).

Other than gaining fancy reporters:

![](https://github.com/axross/tap-diff/raw/master/screenshot1.png)

It's easier to generate json/xml output ... say for jenkins.

If accepted I'll be happy to work on it.
